Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to establishing minimum rules for the treatment of incarcerated individuals
Summary: Relates to establishing minimum rules for the treatment of incarcerated individuals; provides that the United Nations standard minimum rules for the treatment of prisoners, also known as the Nelson Mandela rules, are hereby incorporated by reference.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to establishing minimum rules for the treatment of incarcerated individuals
